levels.levelDescription: Welcome to the Ethereal Woods, where the shadows dance upon the dark-grass pathways. Beware the deep-dark-holes that lurk beneath the surface, ready to swallow the unwary traveler whole.
Descend into the Luminous Caverns, where rusty-chain-platforms guide your way through the molten rivers of lava. The heat radiates off the walls, creating an ominous glow in the depths.

Enter the Shadowed Citadel, a fortress of fractured-wall-platforms surrounded by mysterious waters. Within its walls, the legendary Ethereal Shadow Stalker, Aurorium, awaits, cloaked in darkness and power.
